I have 100 hours now, I've bought most of the DLC, I liked this game on launch, but it's devolved in to a gigantic cluster fuck. I can't delve in to everything, because there's too much wrong with this game, and the devs know it. They won't fix this game. That's not what this game is about anymore. It's not about the community or ensuring longtime fans are given a fair, working, and fun horror experience. It's the profits. The in-store apparel/skin system is ludicrous, especially in a game you already have to pay for. The consistent, and very calculated stream of recognizable killers added to the game every couple months are deliberately done to ensure player numbers stay moderately within profit margins. If there were no new additions to this game for just a solid year, the player base would be dead. The team keeps pumping out new killers to keep interest in the game going, which as a result, destroys the balance. Nerfs and buffs happen all the time, no care in to how survivors and killers mesh together is taken in to consideration. And don't get me started on matchmaking. Actually, you don't have to. It doesn't exist. Ever since they switched to their own servers, it takes minutes just to get in to a lobby, then for people to show up in said lobby. There's also no insurance or balancing on player rank. They say they do, but it's a lie. You can be in a server with total newfags and an OP killer, resulting in a game that doesn't last very long. I spend more time waiting in lobbies than I do in the game. From the time it takes getting in to the game, to first walking in a map, is at least 10 minutes. It's absurd because of how the system in this game is set up. It's no longer fun. There's no community. There's no cohesion. It's a disaster of IP's being thrust in to a simple survival game that's become way over complicated. There are other similar games that deserve your time over this.

In der Anfangsphase war das spiel noch richtig gut, aber nun hat sich alles geändert.
Mit jedem Update wird das spiel schlimmer und schlümmer. Warum behebt man 3 Bugs und fügt 50 neue hinzu?!
Damals so ungefähr in der 1.4 war alles 'in Ordnung' und nun ist alles einfach nur noch unfair. Killer bekommen immer mehr möglichkeiten die Opfer zu finden, zu treffen und zu töten, wo hin im gegensatz dazu die Opfer immer weiter eingeschränkt werden. Über den berühmen Satz eines Mitarbeiters von Behavia: "I think we did a pretty good job so far!" kann mann nur lachen! Ich würd lieber sagen: "Da ist ein bisschen Spiel in euren riesigen Bug!"
Um auf die benachteiligung der Opfer nochmal zu kommen, früher konnte mann mit ein wenig Skill und Glück gute Mitspieler alle Generatoren reparien und es konnten immer 2-4 Spieler entkommen. Nun heute muss mann Glück haben einen wirklichen anfänger Killer zu haben um überhaupt alle Generatoren fertig zu bekommen, was nur selten der Fall ist.

Ich hatte dieses Spiel vielen Empfolen, diesen Fehler werde ich nicht nochmal machen!

P.S: Wer Rechtschreibfehler findet, darf sie behalten.

Nice game. Nice camper.

A pretty fun game, when you don't have campy-killers, lag kills you, players leave when they get on hooks, or even when all of your data gets deleted by nothing. I will just say this simply, it needs a lot of work, not new DLC's it needs to be fixed. I must say that the updates are a improvement, but as much work as possible should be put into it.

以前我是个200多小时的萌新，自认没什么资格去评判这个游戏，我是2017年六月份左右买的这款游戏，不管是谁推荐这款游戏，都会说人类是第三人称视角，有着得天独厚的优势，对于这些人，我只想说，你玩过这款游戏吗？制作者这一年半内做的大改动有人类跳楼硬直，屠夫刀气加强，甚至还有隔墙刀，隔窗刀和隔板刀老玩家们几乎把把碰到，我们就算在怎么把控屠夫与人类的位置，一个bug什么都没啦，影响游玩的bug更多，我不想一一列举，与对屠夫制造的困难来说，人类的困难更多，这算什么平衡游戏，对人类玩家一次次的削弱，哪里有什么快乐？我希望屠夫玩家也能找到游戏内的快乐，但这份快乐我不希望是从人类玩家不公正的游戏平衡上找的。

Jogo bom, mais com muitos bugs e extremamente focado em deixar os killers overpower.

Ich finde, dass es an sich eines der geilsten Spiele überhaupt ist. Allerdings gibt es sehr viele bugs die noch behoben werde müssen. Außerdem sind die Killer meiner Meinung nach momentan viel zu OP. Zum Beispiel die Hexe.. Sie setzt ihre Fallen und wenn man nur in der Nähe von der Falle ist geht sie hoch. Ich finde das ist viel zu Op. Ich fände es besser wenn man die Killer nochmal patchen würde anstatt neue rauszubringen. Zudem sollten die Server überarbeitet werden da die meisten extrem laagen, teilweise unspielbar.

People are toxic - but let's be honest, who's not toxic in a PvP game like this?

On the plus side, the dev's do their best to keep everything balanced. They're continuously working on the game to make it more fair for everyone to play, and when something gets out of balance they do their best to redo it to fix the issue, prevent cheating, etc.

Gamewise I'd definitely suggest if you like spoopy games that base more around skill and technique than just trying to scare. Everyone has a different technique with a vast amount of skills you can use, which makes it all the better.

Sin duda alguna una de las mejores comprar que he hecho este año, mucha gente dice que hay muchos bugs y es cierto pero al menos yo no me los encuentro frecuentemente y cuando pasan siempre me echo unas risas, la principal desventaja que le veo al juego es que no cuenta con servidores privados y la partida la mantiene el asesino y como tenga una mala conexion o este en china... gg wp. Al menos han puesto en la lobby al lado del chat un medidor de ping para que si te va mal te sales y te unes a otra (CONSEJO: Si tienes 130 de ping o 150 no te preocupes mucho lo normal son 120 y te aseguro que no se nota y parece que se juega a 40 el problema es cuando ves que estas a 170 para arriba en tal caso mejor salte para evitar estrellar tu teclado contra la pantalla :v) Sin duda alguna recomiendo este juego y si juegas con amigos puede pasar una semana sin para de jugar que no te aburres, si tuviera que darle nota total le daria un 8.
อิหยังวะ

Dead by Daylight is an extremely addictive 1vs4 objective rush. You're either preventing the four from escaping, or they run around you like gnats for ten-fifteen minutes. There's a strangely in depth strategic system involving perks and survivor items, although some builds and set ups are clearly better over others. No survivor perk is off limits to another survivor given enough time, and the same is true for killer; this means that although it can take time, even at the higher levels you can still be surprised by very strange or new builds. 

If this game was just about the gameplay 8/10, with one point loss being for questionable balance decisions from time to time; Every so often the killers feel like weak nannies chasing after wayward children, or they become the hand of death smacking the flys. 

The other point is for the community. Killers dislike survivor 'mains' or whatever the terminology is, but those who predominantly play survivor appear to be far more vocal. To be fair, that's a rather biased view, as roughly 80% of my time these days is spent chasing after them. 

Anyway. Great game, still feel an unending bloodlust when I see some prick with a flashlight.

这个游戏真的蛮有意思的
砍人与遛屠夫真的欢乐，只不过从玩法上来说太单调了。
大概车队会比较有趣，然而我主要是单排
所以原谅我是一个送快递的机皇hhh
段位重置我觉得很恶心不妨改成具有隐藏分的段位形式，然后所有人每局游戏的隐藏分收益之和为0
关于PY，，，有时候为了刷血点，或者3倍经验什么的 ，也还是挺好的吧TAT
其实我觉得应该每人初始直接给200w血点，不然对于新手实在太不友好了
玩得多的人不仅操作6，还有更强力的技能，挺不公平的
这样也可以减少用CE改血点的人吧
以及，我觉得皮脸的设定和小瘸瘸太接近了，毕竟他是小瘸瘸的原型吧，其实蛮尴尬的，不妨把皮脸作为面具皮肤什么的，然后能力变为可以取代的，外型作为服装dlc收费。不然就感觉有些重合啊喂。
可能黎明杀机作为一个玩法单一的游戏，很难有进步空间，但我还是希望它有新的玩法，迎来第二春hhh

I have left the original review below as the good points still stand.

It seems they have now resolved the progress loss issue which was my main gripe with the game. If this is the case (touch wood) I cant recommend this game enough.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So this game is a tale of two reviews...

Firstly, the game itself is decent and works really well... played both survior and killer and the two different approaches really feel different and allow a large amount of customisation.

Everything clicks together from the perks to the maps to really make the mechanics worth coming back for, unfortunately thats where we get into the second part of the review.

I have 7 hours of playtime at the point of this review and have had 3 full progress resets. This is where any points or items you have earnt just dissapear and you have to start the game from pretty much day 0 again.

If you dont mind this and just want to jump in every now and again then its a decent game, however if you cant this I would steer clear of this game until the issue is resolved.

Its a shame, its a decent game but not good enough to have to start from scratch every couple of days.

Gioco migliorato dall'ultima volta che ci ho giocato cioè nel 2016. Avevo smesso di giocarci per il matchamaking che non trovava partite e per i molteplici hug ma ora l'hanno migliorato molto quindi ho iniziato di nuovi a giocarci. Lo amo.

когда мне было 19 лет, и я чинил генераторы, маньяк все время как бы невзначай крутился возле меня и все спрашивал: что ты там молчишь? почему тебя не слышно? первый раз я не ответил, так он начал в инвиз входить и орать: что ты там молчишь? что с тобой? начал материться и говорить, что вообще капканов наставит, алсо, маньяк ругался, если я крюки ломаю, причем не просто после повешения, а непосредственно в начале игры, мотивировал это тем, что и так крюков мало, и сам потом мне говорил: вот я крюки не ломаю, и ты так делай! однажды я генератор чинить стал, и слышу, маньяк где-то сзади встал в отдалении, ну я чинить перестал и в шкаф залез, а там щель очень широкая снизу у шкафа, ну я в щель и смотрю, а там маньяк на карачиках сидит и в щель смотрит, и мне говорит: ты че? е#анутый? че ты там делаешь? маньяк кстати все время какие-то перки качает, чтоб ловить чаще, ловит по пять раз в день, а потом говорит что сезон закончился, и еще пилу заводит он. пиз#ец короче! реальная история. я не кемпер.

Yes this game is good. Yes I highly recommend it. There is some things you should know before going into the game. This game is gonna be easy and hard. Some killers are easy to escape and some you cant seem to go anywhere without them finding you. This game is really good. With enough perks and items to keep any game intresting. I recommend a new player to play as a survivor first and follow someone around when you find them or watch a few youtubers play it the game has some things your gonna wanna know about before you get into it. Its a decent horror game and I recommend it to anyone looking for a horror game. Its scared me good too many times. But i recommend it. Its good. Ive put a good 40+ hours before I bought any DLC and I bought the Halloween DLC and I gotta say money well spent.

杀鸡是我steam上的第一款游戏，也是最爱的，所有dlc全部入了手，但是我不推荐大家购买。
首先说说优点，官方对于中国玩家的重视有目共睹，官方微博，公众号开通，各种活动，特色角色，游戏本身模式新颖有趣，非常耐玩。
缺点：让人窒息的平衡系统，屠夫加强加强再加强，移动速度增加，翻窗速度增加，加杀戮欲望，板子减少，加上假板子，果然屠夫是制作组亲儿子啊，生怕他被人欺负了，可是我们想看到的不是一个屠夫称霸的游戏，而是一个技术至上的游戏，别人玩了一千小时的人皇，为什么不能溜你个一百小时的屠夫？游戏初衷是一款躲猫猫游戏，但是玩家就不能玩出自己的玩法？一人溜四人修现在已经很难了，每个人都狗在角落修电机，这游戏还有什么意思？就得你开发者说怎么玩就怎么玩？ 那你很棒棒哦？在公众号留言只有夸赞才能上墙，建议什么的不存在，不上墙不回复，假装看不见，果然，来我大天朝几年，我大天朝zf的特色学的有模有样，本地化做的不错。最大的缺点，也是我失望的原因，就是让人心累的服务器，前段时间每局都卡到怀疑人生，现在也偶尔，更不要说满天飞的bug，制作组一句“我认为我们目前在bug这块已经做的很好了”被玩家调侃至今，上线这么久的游戏，还能有这么多bug也算罕见。最后，丢档问题，玩家大面积丢档你敢信？发邮件给官方几个星期没处理，就给你个自动回复，在公众号留言甚至不让你上墙，更不回复，总之一句话，假装没看到，这种态度真的让玩家寒心。
我很喜爱这款游戏，但我的耐心也是有限的，我相信其他玩家也一样，死忠粉也不意味着无限的包容，杀鸡已经不比当年了，粉丝也已经很少了，这种运营，这种开发，希望制作组不是在亲手把自己的游戏往坟墓里推。

我觉得吧，这个游戏还是很好玩的，不像别人说的那样很辣鸡的游戏，说真的我真的希望这个游戏能一直活下去，不要GG了。

A ver por donde empiezo, la primera razon es que necesita urgentemente servidores dedicados debido a que con el tipo de conexion que necesitas para jugar optimamente y poder hostear bien a los survivors es un poco especial y no muchos logran o saben como tenerla ya que es de tipo P2P, la segunda que creo que también es la principal de muchos es lo desbalanceado que está el juego mas que todo en el modo SWF(Survive With Friends) lo cual a paso de tortuga están tratando de arreglarlo. Ademas existen bugs varios los que si suelen recibir el parcheo necesario pero aun asi molestan la experiencia de juego en una que otra partida.

A pesar de esas cosas todavia me resulta un gran juego con una excelente tematica y mecanica pero que requiere una mejor atencion por parte del equipo de desarrolladores.
Aun le tengo fe a este juego y eso es lo que me mantiene jugandolo en ocasiones, definitivamente le cambiare la calificacion cuando este mejor arreglado :)

Edit: La verdad que desde que hice la ultima actualizacion a esta reseña han agregado y mejorado bastantes cosas lo cual por ahora me hace cambiarle la recomendación sobre todo si está de oferta, cuando consiga ver cambios fundamentales le dare una calificacion definitiva

Отличная игра, довольно атмосферная. Интересно играть как за маньяков (непередаваемые АЧУЧЕНИЯ:) так и за выживших. К сожалению случаются баги, которые доставляют неудобства. Слышал, что иногда у людей слетают сейвы (стараюсь делать бекап), но разработчики поддерживают игру и выпускают как патчи, так и свежий контент. Цены на длс приемлемые, огорчает уж слишком большое многообразие скинов которые можно приобрести только задонатив денег

И так начнем, игра такова играешь за выживающего бегаешь из угла в угол, чинишь генератор при этом пытаясь не обоссаться, а если попался то пзц, тебя пытаются спасти и в итоге нахуй сами лежат. Ну а если удалось вас вытащить из этого дерьма, там вообще начинаеся какая то очередная ужасающая игра в голю и туки-туки, где ты не с самой сильной стороны выступаешь, твое сердце на равне с твоим персонажем хуярит не по-детски, как будто вот вот выйдет кукушенок из твоего заднего прохода. Игра напряженная, сердцебеение это что то, за идею отдельный респект разрабам. Что касается маньяка просто хуяришь всех. 10 обоссаных штанов из 10.

游戏音效及背景音乐很到位，有恐怖游戏的韵味。PVP的游戏模式机制在恐怖生存了游戏上是一种创新，考验团队作战以及心理战术，是一款有操作有意识有良好游戏体验的游戏！
